content.question: If <math alttext="x times the cosine of y equals, pi minus 2 y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>x</mi><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>π</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></math>, then <math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mrow></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator the cosine of y, and denominator x times the sine of y, minus 2, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator the cosine of y, and denominator 2 plus, x times the sine of y, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator the negative cosine of y, and denominator 2 plus, x times the sine of y, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator x times the sine of y, minus the cosine of y, and denominator 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator the cosine of y, and denominator x times the sine of y, minus 2, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
